channel.title: Shop Help? Please
channel.description: I want to make one specific shop accept, let's say, tokkul, which is 6529. How do i do that? I know I have to change the "GetItem(995, 1) deleteItem.." to the code, but won't it affect all the other shops too?

item.title: Shop Help? Please
item.dc:creator: @RunescapeBR RunescapeBR
item.description:
@RunescapeBR wrote:

I want to make one specific shop accept, let’s say, tokkul, which is 6529. How do i do that? I know I have to change the “GetItem(995, 1) deleteItem…” to the code, but won’t it affect all the other shops too?

Read full topic
